_note: NOT AVAILABLE — internal endpoint, requires undocumented parameters

findings: These are internal Supabase row/table IDs embedded only in MetaForge's SvelteKit client bundle — not exposed in any public docs or manifest.
All tested parameter combinations (numeric IDs 1-10, map name slugs, hyphenated slugs) return HTTP 500.
MetaForge's public API documentation (https://metaforge.app/arc-raiders/api) does not list this endpoint.
The five documented public endpoints (items, arcs, quests, traders, events-schedule) all work correctly.
Map location/POI data may be partially derivable from quest `position` fields (x/y coordinates) and `locations` arrays already available in the quests endpoint.
_investigation.recommendation: Do not use this endpoint. Use quest positions and locations from /api/arc-raiders/quests for map marker data, or check MetaForge's Discord for if/when they expose map data publicly.
